name: restate-ts-template
description: Template for JavaScript/TypeScript services running with Restate (https://github.com/restatedev/)

scripts.reset: bun run clear-restate; bun run clear-dynamodb || true;
scripts.register-with-restate: bun run clear-restate; restate deployments reg web2text-devcontainer:9075 --force --yes --quiet
scripts.clear-restate: restate invocations cancel 'Lead' --kill --yes --quiet || true; restate state clear 'Lead' --yes --quiet || true;
scripts.clear-restate-test: restate invocations cancel 'Lead-test' --kill --yes --quiet || true; restate state clear 'Lead-test' --yes --quiet || true;
